text: Klébert Balmat (22 June 1896 - 2 July 1961) was a French skier. He competed at the 1924 Winter Olympics and the 1928 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1961 deaths Category:French male ski jumpers Category:French male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of France Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of France Category:Ski jumpers at the 1924 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1928 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1924 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1928 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Klébert Balmat
